THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON
04.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

as
ees
Crl.MC.No.2846 OF 2014 202UKER/7
2
ORDER
The offences alleged are under Section 420,
423, 465, 468 of IPC. The matter settled out of
court. An affidavit sworn by the defacto
complainant produced to show the settlement arrived
at out of the Court. Hence, if it is proceeded
further, it will not serve any purpose. Hence, the
FIR and its further proceedings are quashed.
The Crl.M.C. is allowed accordingly.
Sd/-
P.SOMARAJAN
JUDGE
SPV
